long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Planet Search is a powerful search tool designed to provide users with independent search results while prioritizing the optimal search engine for their region. This browser extension, available on the Chrome Store, offers a secure and safe search experience.

With Planet Search, users can break free from the filter bubble effect, where search results are tailored to their previous search history and preferences.

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, You accept and agree to install the Planet search Chrome extension and set Chrome Default search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use [https://planet-search.com/terms] and Privacy Policy [https://planet-search.com/privacy] . The default search results will be provided by Google.

To remove the Planet Search extension from Chrome:

 - Click the three-dot menu icon in the top-right corner of Chrome.
 - Go to "More tools" and select "Extensions" from the dropdown menu.
 - Locate the Planet Search extension in the extensions list.
 - Click the remove button (trash can icon) next to the Planet Search extension.
 - Confirm the removal when prompted.

We ensure that users receive search results that are more relevant and catered to their local context, enhancing the accuracy and usefulness of the search experience.
